channel.title: I need some damn help!
channel.description:
I Whana know how to add dragon claws on my 508 server
Noboday can tell me its impossbile i saw death cape , full bandos and other things on a 508 ....
SO ITS NOT IMPOSSIBLE !

item.title: I need some damn help!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“TheImpureOne, post:2, topic:295385”]Correct me if I am wrong, but I am pretty sure that as of right now it is impossible to add any new models into a 508, I know that in 317’s you can add models at will. Usually you see Deathcape in 317’s and 508’s already have Full bandos etc… so you were probably on a 317 client.

Also, Don’t put such abrasive titles on your topics.[/quote]

It is not imposable and has already been done.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some damn help!
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

Any server that is 508+ has full bandos, also there is no such thing as a Bandos Cape in rs unless it was added into the client which I believe is impossible at this point in time. Again, you were probably on a 317 with HD graphic’s.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some damn help!

i think there was saying 508 not 317 and he was having HD client … and i really whana see a 508 server that already have full bandos ( helm , cape , gloves )[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 09:51:59 am[/size][hr]

Also, Don’t put such abrasive titles on your topics.
Because nobody answer me … and its the first time after 15 topics …

item.title: I need some damn help!
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

Correct me if I am wrong, but I am pretty sure that as of right now it is impossible to add any new models into a 508, I know that in 317’s you can add models at will. Usually you see Deathcape in 317’s and 508’s already have Full bandos etc… so you were probably on a 317 client.

Also, Don’t put such abrasive titles on your topics.
